name: d3-vector
description: Module for defining connections between nodes in a force graph as directional vectors

scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup --banner "$(preamble)" -g d3-collection:d3,d3-interpolate:d3 -f umd -n d3 -o build/d3-vector.js -- index.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs --preamble "$(preamble)" build/d3-vector.js -c -m -o build/d3-vector.min.js
scripts.postpublish: VERSION=`node -e 'console.log(require("./package.json").version)'`; git push && git push --tags && cd ../d3.github.com && git pull && cp ../d3-force/build/d3-force.js d3-force.v1.js && cp ../d3-force/build/d3-force.min.js d3-force.v1.min.js && git add d3-force.v1.js d3-force.v1.min.js && git commit -m "d3-force ${VERSION}" && git push && cd - && zip -j build/d3-force.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-force.js build/d3-force.min.js
scripts.test: echo "Woo! You're so great at this!"

author: Josh Bourgeois
